attributes.action: The UK should implement and internet based voting system
attributes.additional_details:
Other countries allready have voting on the internet as an option in elections with great success. A good overview of the topic can be found at https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-39955468

Internet based voting system is an inevitability considering the impact the internet has had on every other aspect of life.

This could also be a revolution in not only how we vote but why we vote as each vote will be from a place where we can research an issue at the same time as voting.
attributes.background: There are many benefits to internet voting systems. E.g. it will be more convenient leading to increased participation, it will allow people who can't get to or are uncomfortable going to a voting station to vote and can be used to vote on any topic easily allowing for more issues to be voted on.
